ask_saved_question_by_name.desc: Ask a saved question by referencing the name of a saved question in a string.
ask_saved_question_by_name.xml_desc: Get the Saved Question object for Installed Applications then get the latest result data available for that Saved Question

ask_saved_question_by_name_sse.desc: Ask a saved question by referencing the name of a saved question in a string and use Server Side Export when performing a GetResultData
ask_saved_question_by_name_sse.xml_desc: Get the Saved Question object for Installed Applications then get the latest result data available using Server Side Export for that Saved Question

ask_saved_question_by_name_in_list.desc: Ask a saved question by referencing the name of a saved question in a list of strings.

ask_saved_question_refresh_data.desc: Ask a saved question and refresh the data for the saved question (asks a new question)
ask_saved_question_refresh_data.xml_desc: Get the Saved Question object for Installed Applications, ask the server to refresh the data vailable, wait for the new question spawned to complete results, then get the latest result data available for that Saved Question
